overview: The fourteenth installment in the Super!! Scary Psychic Video series. This is a video taken at a roadside station in a town where the contributor, who was out of business, happened to stop by because he had free time on the way. If you take a picture of the surroundings with a fresh feeling only at the place you visited for the first time, people from different worlds will sneak up at the feet of the contributor.
tagline: A collection of psychic videos that everyone is sure to be scared!!
title: Super!! Scary Psychic Video 14
